Paragraph.Text: International development banks shall be subject to the following provisions of chapter 655 as though such international development banks were state banks:

SubParagraph.Text: Section 655.005, relating to definitions.
Section 655.012, relating to general supervisory powers of the office.
Section 655.016, relating to liability.
Section 655.031, relating to administrative enforcement guidelines.
Section 655.032, relating to investigations; etc.
Section 655.0321, relating to hearings and proceedings.
Section 655.033, relating to cease and desist orders.
Section 655.034, relating to injunctions.
Section 655.037, relating to removal of financial institution-affiliated party.
Section 655.041, relating to administrative fines.
Section 655.043, relating to articles of incorporation.
Section 655.044, relating to accounting practices.
Section 655.045, relating to examinations, reports, and internal audits.
Section 655.049, relating to deposit of fees and assessments.
Section 655.057, relating to records.
Section 655.071, relating to international banking facilities.
Section 655.50, relating to reports of transactions involving currency.

Paragraph.Text: In addition, except as otherwise specifically provided in this part, international development banks shall be subject to the following provisions of chapter 658 as though such international development banks were state banks:

SubParagraph.Text: Section 658.32, relating to annual shareholders meetings.
Section 658.39, relating to stockholder examination of records.
Section 658.79, relating to insolvency.

Subsection.Text: International development banks shall have no greater rights and powers under, or by virtue of, this section than are specifically granted to such international development banks under this part.
